top_comments.comment: Jeezuz Christ Garland get off your ass and do something! Your country is IMPLODING 🤯🤷‍♀️

comments_since_last_sample.body: What the hell are they waiting for Christmas?

What is the gain? Why the need to delay, what is getting left out that needs in... 😽

You know how... when you reflect and question...
Why do I know this “ frustrating “ feel ....
Short story:reference to me..
I stood in my living room, stating I wanted more help for my child, I was very firmly told “ get the f out”. 20 years in , 2 days later, I was out..... not down, not done and his hands that were around my neck... will not reach my flesh again.

under trump, I can understand and support his cautious and careful but deliberate management approach at this precarious time.

Of course Congress should be using their inherent power of contempt, I think that's what it's called, but this will go on and on and on. The longer it goes on stalling and trying to run out the clock the less faith all of Americans I have in our Congress and our DOJ. What the hell are we waiting for! This is October 31 and this all happened back in January. I just can't believe that anything would take this long that is this important. This wouldn't happen with you or me
